name: 甘奈
text: むーん……
trans: Mmm...

name: 甜花
text: うーん……
trans: Hmm...

name: 千雪
text:
お疲れさまです──
……あら、甘奈ちゃんと甜花ちゃん？
trans:
Good morning!
...Oh, Amana-chan and Tenka-chan?

name: 甘奈
text:
……あ、千雪さん！
お疲れさまでーす
trans:
...Ah, Chiyuki-san!
Hello!

name: 甜花
text: あ、お……お疲れさまです……
trans: Ah, h-hello...

name: 千雪
text: はい、お疲れさまです♪
trans: Hello to you too♪

name: 千雪
text:
ふたりとも……にらめっこしてたの？
すごい顔してる
trans:
What were you two staring at?
You were wearing such serious faces.

name: 甜花
text:
えと……ぬいぐるみ、作らなくちゃ、いけなくて……
でも……上手く、できない……
trans:
Uhm... We have, to make, stuffed animals...
But... We can't seem to get it right...

name: 甘奈
text:
家庭科の課題なんだー
クマを作るの
trans:
It's our assignment in home economicsー
Making a bear.

name: 甘奈
text:
もっと簡単にできると思ったんだけど……
甘奈、もう無理ー！
trans:
I thought there was an easier way of doing it but...
Amana can't take it anymore!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、そういうことなのね
……見てもいーい？
trans:
Fufu, it's like that, huh.
...Is it okay if I take a look?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん！　見て見て
千雪さんに教えてもらいたいなー
trans:
Mhm! Please do!
I want to be taught by Chiyuki-san.

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……！
甜花も……！
trans:
Y-Yeah...!
Tenka too...!

name: 千雪
text:
待って待って
どれどれ……
trans:
Just a second.
Let's see what we have here...

name: 千雪
text: ……きゃっ！
trans: ...Kya!

name: 甘奈
text: ……あ、びっくりしちゃった！？
trans: ...Ah, did it catch you off guard?

name: 甜花
text:
な、なーちゃんの、まだ……
体……バラバラ……
trans:
N-Naa-chan's work is...
The body's still... incomplete...

name: 千雪
text:
ご、ごめんなさい
手順通りだとこうなるわよね……！
trans:
S-Sorry. 
It's like this since we're still in the middle of making 
it, of course...!

name: 千雪
text:
私、自分でもいつもびっくりしちゃうの
……気にしないでね
trans:
I even get surprised by my own work.
...Don't think too much about it, okay?

name: 甘奈
text: ヘ、ヘンなときに見せちゃった……
trans: W-We ended up showing it to you at a weird time...

name: 千雪
text:
ううん。でも……
ふふ、パーツごとにきちんとできてる
trans:
That's not true. But...
Fufu, I can see that each part has been carefully 
crafted.

name: 千雪
text:
ここまでくれば、
あとはそれほど難しくないわ
trans:
If you've gotten this far,
the rest shouldn't be too hard.

name: 甘奈
text: 本当？
trans: Really?

name: 千雪
text: 本当。きっとかわいく仕上がります！
trans: Yeah. I'm sure it'll turn out cute!

name: 甘奈
text:
やったー！
じゃ、やっぱり甘奈がんばるね
trans:
Yay!
In that case, Amana should continue putting effort 
into it, right?

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、うん
甜花ちゃんのはどんなクマさん？
trans:
Fufu, yup.
What kind of bear did you make, Tenka-chan?

name: 甜花
text:
う……
こ、これ……
trans:
Uu...
T-This one...

name: 千雪
trans: Huh? ...Cloth?

name: 甘奈
text:
あ……
甜花ちゃんは、まだこれからで……
trans:
Ah...
Tenka-chan, hasn't gone past this...

name: 甜花
text:
あう……
どうやるか……わかんなくて……
trans:
Awh...
I don't know... how I should do it...

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈と一緒にやるもんねー
trans: That's why we're doing it together, rightー

name: 甜花
text:
う、うん……
がんばる……！
trans:
Y-Yeah...
I'll do my best!

name: 千雪
text:
そっか
甜花ちゃんも、えらいのね
trans:
I see.
Tenka-chan's amazing too.

name: 甜花
text:
そ……そんなこと……
ない……けど……！
trans:
T-That's...
Not... really...!

name: 千雪
text:
ううん
じゃあ、私もお手伝いしなくっちゃ
trans:
No, it's true.
Well then, it's about time I stepped in to help!

name: 甘奈
text: わぁ！　それじゃ、教えてくれるのー？
trans: Wow! Then, you'll be teaching us?

name: 千雪
text:
もちろんよ
最高に素敵なクマさんにしようね
trans:
Of course!
Let's make the most wonderful stuffed bear.

name: 甜花
trans: Y-Yeah...!

name: 千雪
text: じゃあまずは──
trans: So first of allー

name: 甘奈
text: ふんふん……！
trans: Hmhm...!

name: 甜花
text: う、うん……！
trans: Y-Yes...!

name: 千雪
text: お出かけしましょう♪
trans: Let's go out♪

name: 甘奈
text: えっ……？

name: 甜花
text: お……お出かけ……？
trans: G-Go out...?

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、そう
手芸屋さんまでお散歩するの
trans:
Fufu, yes.
Let's go take a walk to the handicrafts store.

name: 千雪
text: 次のオフは……どうかしら？
trans: I wonder... When's our next day off?

name: 甘奈
text:
えっと……
甘奈は、ぜんぜん空いてるけど──
trans:
Uh...
Amana doesn't really have any free time though.

name: 甜花
text:
ざ……材料……
もう、あるよ……？
trans:
T-The materials...
We already have them though...?

name: 千雪
text:
そうね
でも……
trans:
That's right.
But...

name: 千雪
text:
自分が気に入った布とかボタンを使うと、
作るときにずっと楽しくなるの
trans:
If you use cloth and buttons that suit your tastes,
I'm sure making them will become fun.

name: 千雪
text: もっと、いろんな材料を買いにいきましょう？
trans:
Don't you want to go and buy more things to use for 
it?

name: 甘奈
text:
へぇー！
それ、なんかよさそう！
trans:
Wow!
That sounds pretty nice!

name: 甜花
text:
お買い物……外……
……人、いっぱい……
trans:
Shopping... Outside...
...Too many, people...

name: 甘奈
text:
……あ、でも、
甜花ちゃんはやめとく……？
trans:
...Ah, but
Tenka-chan, you don't want to...?

name: 甘奈
text: 甘奈が代わりに買ってくるよ
trans:
In that case, Amana will go and buy what you need for 
you instead.

name: 千雪
text:
まぁ、
無理なこと言っちゃったかしら……
trans:
My, it seems that I went and suggested something 
unreasonable...

name: 甜花
text: う、ううん……
trans: T-That's not it...

name: 甜花
text:
へ、平気……！
甜花も……ふたりと行きたい……
trans:
I-It's alright...!
Tenka... wants to go with the two of you too...

name: 甘奈
text: 甜花ちゃん……
trans: Tenka-chan...

name: 甜花
text:
甜花も……
さ、最高のクマ、つくる……！
trans:
The best stuffed bear...
Tenka, will make one too...!

name: 千雪
text:
……ふふ
甜花ちゃん……やっぱりえらいなぁ
trans:
...Fufu.
Tenka-chan... You really are amazing, aren't you.

name: 甜花
text: う、ううん……！

name: 甘奈
text:
イエーイ！　じゃあ、３人でお出かけだね！
すっごく楽しみになってきたー☆
trans:
Yay! Right, so the three of us will be going out to buy 
stuff! I'm so looking forward to it☆
